document_data.name: ''Composite Longbow of the Hand''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Composite longbows of the Hand''''' were masterfully crafted [[longbow]]s found in the [[Seldarine's Hand]] citadel on the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Description: These bows were crafted by joint efforts of [[elves]] of the Seldarine's Hand and [[dwarves]] of [[Dorn's Deep]].
document_data.Powers: ''Composite longbows of the Hand'' possessed a ''+2'' enchantment.
document_data.History: After completion of construction of Seldarine's Hand ''circa'' [[900 DR]], the inhabitants of the citadel lived in a close alliance with the dwarves of Dorn's Deep. The troops of the elven citadel were outfitted with the best armor and weapons created by the crafters of both races. By [[1281 DR]], the Seldarine's Hand had been ruined for centuries and came to be known as the Severed Hand, within, ''composite longbows of the Hand'' could be found within the Tower of [[Corellon]].
